<template>
    EditView: {{ $route.params.id  }}
</template>

<script>
import MemoForm from '@/components/MemoForm.vue'
export default {
  name: 'EditView',
  components: {
    MemoForm
  },
  computed: {
    memo(){
      const id = (this.$route.params.id)
      return this.$store.getters.getMemoById(id)
    }
  }
}
</script>
